00041 
00048   size_t buffer_remain(const uint8_t *p) {
00049     if (p < buffer.base && p > buffer.base + buffer.size)
00050       HT_THROW(Error::METALOG_ENTRY_TRUNCATED, "checking buffer space");
00051     return buffer.base + buffer.size - p;
00052   }
00053 
00054   TableIdentifierManaged table;
00055   RangeSpecManaged range;
00056 };
